subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Corey Kluber came within an out of a complete game, striking out 10 to help the visiting Cleveland Indians earn a win against the Detroit Tigers, 6-2, on Saturday in the opener of a doubleheader.
snippet: Corey Kluber came within an out of a complete game, striking out 10 to help the visiting Cleveland Indians earn a win against the Detroit Tigers, 6-2, on Saturday in the opener of a doubleheader.
